title: How about give 3v3 the mastery earnings
body: How about let twisted tree line earn the level 6-7 mastery maybe then people will play maybe or even give the same mastery points as it would playing summoners rift.

replies.body: You don't earn them on ARAM either, which I think is kinda fair. The game is balanced around summoner's rift, when you look at the treeline and abyss metas, in my opinion that's very clear. Although, once upon a time you didn't earn mastery points at all, so who knows? Maybe one day.
